about_the_game:
Are you ready to step into a world of darkness and fear? “Downstairs 2 Nightfall,” will take you to the peak of suspense, horror and action. This unforgettable adventure begins in the relative calm of a safe house (safehouse) and then continues in an abandoned village where mysterious and frightening events take place behind the fog.

Our main character must embark on this dangerous journey to find his missing lover Mary. At every step he will face his fears, uncover the secrets of the dark past and try to survive in the midst of unimaginable events. What begins in a safe house turns into a terrifying and complex labyrinth as the hope of saving Mary pulls him deeper into fear and despair.
The game includes a weapon and a flashlight attached to the weapon, dangerous enemies on the map, notes you can read in some places, and bullets you can use for your weapon.

In this unique experience:

Moments of Suspense: Dangers lurk around dark corners and sudden surprises will keep you on your toes. You'll have to tread carefully and anticipate what awaits around every corner.
Action-Packed Encounters: You will have to defend yourself and survive using a variety of weapons and tools. Each encounter will require adrenaline-fueled moments and strategic thinking.
Mysterious Story: Discover the mysterious secrets behind Mary's disappearance and uncover the dark events of the past. The story will keep you in constant suspense and each new discovery will make the previous question more complex.
Immersive Graphics and Sound Effects: The atmosphere of the game will completely immerse you. With detailed graphics and realistic sound effects, you will feel the moments of fear in your bones. From dark forests to abandoned houses, each location is meticulously designed and will draw you in.


Do you dare to face your fears and uncover the darkest secrets? Get ready to descend into the deepest darkness with “Downstairs 2 Nightfall” and embark on a dark and terrifying adventure to save Mary. From the sheltered walls of the safe house to the deserted streets of the village, you must be on your guard at all times to survive. Mary's fate is in your hands.

  • Processor: Intel i7-14700K 3.40 GHz
